EmailTemplate.name: K12 Prospect
EmailTemplate.subject: Great to see you at the trade show.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Discover how Office Depot can help you succeed.
Put our powerful solutions and services to work for you.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was great to see you at the trade show! I wanted to send you a quick note and let you know that Office Depot® is here for you and your school in every capacity — whenever you need us.
Look to us to be a partner you can count on for the personal attention, dedicated service, leading-edge solutions and competitive pricing your school deserves.
Office supplies are just the beginning.
We’ll help you keep your school stocked up on what it needs most, but you can also count on us for:
· Customized solutions · Multichannel services · World-class support
· Incredible value · 30+ years of expertise · Supply chain success
Experience the Office Depot difference.
Contact me at any time and let me know how Office Depot can help your school succeed today.
Sincerely, {!User.Name} {!User.TitleTrimmed__c}
{!User.Street} | {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode} {!if(!ISBLANK(User.My_Customer_Contact__c), 'Tel: '+User.My_Customer_Contact__c,'' )} Email: {!User.Email}

Have questions? Contact us online or call 888-2-OFFICE (8﻿8﻿8.2﻿6﻿3.3﻿4﻿2﻿3). Privacy Policy
